name: Penelope Dress in Black Wool.
description:
The popular  knee length strapless party dress with Tulip skirt makes a comeback in a beautiful black woolen twill fabric. Lightly boned bodice is lined with magenta polka dot cotton for a cheerful touch!.

This fabric gives the design a sophisticated, tailored feel and looks FABULOUS layered with a simple tee as I have done here or a boyfriend style blazer and killer heels. Its versatility and comfort is what makes this a wonderful addition to your wardrobe.

In seam slouch pockets solve the perennial problem of what to do with your hands. Use them to maintain your aloof air or simply to stow your lippy!.

Zip fastening. Hand made and finished with superb styling and attention to detail.

All pieces are made to order, Please purchase the size nearest your own and I will contact you to finalise measurements to ensure you recieve a piece that is all your own!.
Any special requirements fancy a different fabric? just ask!

name: Mairead skirt
description:
Add a little volume for day or evening with this pretty little skirt. Rich, soft and gorgeous burgundy courduroy is fashioned into a softly flattering bell shape with a slightly high waistband fastened with a side zip.

This skirt is endlessly versatile. Teamed with tights or leggings and a casual sweater, or worn high and sleek with a tucked in tank top and a wide belt it is suitable for both day and night

You will love the simple styling, attention to detail and the hand finishing that goes into each piece.

Handmade to order, simply purchase the size based on your waist measurement. I will contact you to confirm the exact measurement so not to worry if it is off your real size.
Any special requirements? another fabric? no problem! just ask.

name: Penelope Party Dress
description:
Stunning knee length strapless party dress with Tulip skirt in a Silver Grey linen suiting fabric. Lightly boned bodice is lined with magenta polka dot cotton for a cheerful touch!.
In seam slouch pockets solve the perennial problem of what to do with your hands.

Zip fastening. Hand made and finished with superb styling and attention to detail.

All pieces are made to order, Please purchase the size nearest your own and I will contact you to finalise measurements to ensure you recieve a piece that is all your own!.
Any special requirements fancy a different fabric? just ask!

name: Hanne- Navy Blue Corduroy skirt
description:
A new piece from my autumn Winter collection.

Gorgeous classic with a twist. Navy Blue Needle Cord skirt with side zip fastening. Slightly high waisted with pleats at waistband to give a slightly tulip shaped appearance. Perfect for work or play you will love the simple classic styling and attention to detail..

Fully interfaced and serged with vintage liberty fabric binding at the waistband.
